means: （当作燃料或造纸用的）甘蔗渣

sentence.Network_en: A few years before his death he perfected a method of converting bagasse into paper pulp.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他去世前几年,他改进了用甘蔗渣制纸浆的方法.

sentence.Network_en: Commercial cellulase, hemicellulase and pectinase were applied to hydrolyze sugar cane bagasse.
sentence.Network_cn: 应用纤维素酶 、 半纤维素酶和果胶酶水解蔗渣.

sentence.Network_en: Bagasse fibre: Fibre sometines used in paper - making obtained from sugar cane.
sentence.Network_cn: 蔗渣纤维: 甘蔗压榨后的蔗渣纤维,可作造纸用.
